CustomField.description: US-0009350 - [Ads 2020] EU Floor Price/Ad Type/Priority Requirements
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c,"CPM") && Floor_Price__c > CPM_net__c , true, IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c,"CPO"), Pricebook_Name__c <> "Prebid automation") , true, IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c,"CPC") , true,false) ) )
CustomField.label: Below Floor
